title: Heat wave in Delhi pushes peak power demand to all-time high level of 8656 MW
description: According to the realtime data of State Load Dispatch Centre (SLDC) Delhi, the peak power demand reached 8656 MW at 15:06:55 hrs on Wednesday.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
